definitions.definition: The large forward ring on a bicycle that a chain attaches to, in order to transfer energy to a wheel . It consists of one or more sprockets that are driven by the cranks and pedals of the bicycle.

main_definition: The large forward ring on a bicycle that a chain attaches to, in order to transfer energy to a wheel . It consists of one or more sprockets that are driven by the cranks and pedals of the bicycle.
